wandascribe-desc: Provides literary assistance for wikitext editing using Wanda's AI capabilities, similar to Grammarly
wandascribe-error: An error occurred. Please try again.
wandascribe-no-text-selected: Please select some text to get assistance.
wandascribe-select-text-hint: Select text in the editor to get writing assistance.
wandascribe-wanda-not-available: Wanda extension is not available or not properly configured.
